comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: Had to come into the office (can’t VPN into a BSOD’d machine, apparently) but it should be fixed now.

comments.author: Chunky Milk.2130
comments.body:
looking at the EU matchups on mos, it looks like they might be correct, need an EU to confirm.

Based on that, it looks like it is NA matchup issues in the API exclusively. Note that when the API went down for everything else and was bugged to kitten a few weeks ago it was notification after notification – it is WvW only now and we’re back to not caring…

comments.author: jamesdolla.3954
comments.body: If it’s wvw only problem don’t expect it to get fixed anytime soon

comments.author: Jirayu.5834
comments.body: API still showing data from last week match. only KDR is reset to this week.

comments.author: Drant.5902
comments.body:
In game, I’m seeing: YB, HoD SF, SBI BP
In API, I’m seeing: YB, DB DH, SBI BP

I’m guessing the other tiers aren’t updated either. The Victory Points seem to be last week’s since they’re 300+ even though today is a match reset.

Also, was the “skirmishes” property recently added to the API? Should that array have 85 historical skirmishes? I don’t know if it’s supposed to have last week’s history.
